docs.text: the ads for " batman and robin " scream " the event of the summer is here " and that's the problem .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the producers were apparently so intent on creating a spectacle that they forgot to put an actual movie inside of it .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: " batman and robin " is 126 minutes of lavish sets , flashy costumes and big , confusing fight scenes with barely a hint of substance .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it's like one of those cheesy kings island stage shows ; bright , busy and visually diverting , but not very much fun .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it wasn't always this way .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: tim burton's " batman " was an epic story of obsession and duality , of darkness and revenge .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the film , while far from perfect , was a striking mood piece with an otherworldly feel .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: batman was a creepy , brooding creature of the night .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the joker , brilliantly overplayed by jack nicholson , was at once charismatic and repellent .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: batman and the joker were opposite sides of the same coin , battling inner demons and one another over gotham city's breathtaking gothic skyline .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: those days of the dark knight are gone , replaced by a psychedelic ice capades run amuck .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: " batman and robin " has far more in common with the campy 60's batman tv show than with tim burton's tale of darkness .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the blame lies with director joel schumacher .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: a former window-dresser , schumacher is adept at decorating sets and dressing people in exotic costumes .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: unfortunately , when it comes time to have those people walk and talk , he hasn't the faintest notion of what to do .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: " batman and robin " is overstuffed with intricately choreographed fight scenes so poorly edited that it's often difficult to tell who's whacking who .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: while the characters flail at each other , one-liners and bad puns are tossed about like confetti .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: a few carefully placed jokes can set an action movie sailing , but too many wisecracks can undermine the momentum of a film .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: " batman and robin " doesn't merely lose momentum , it stalls out completely on several occasions .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it's rare to see an action flick as sluggish as this one .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: ironically , the parts of " batman and robin " that work are the ones showing the characters in street clothing , and most of those succeed because of george clooney as bruce wayne .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: easily the best batman yet , clooney's expressive eyes and weary smile gives the character a sense of depth that the script doesn't even hint at .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the film's most effective scene is a tender , quiet exchange between clooney and alfred ( michael gough ) , bruce wayne's butler and surrogate father .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: as for the other heroes , chris o'donnell's robin is enthusiastic , perky and horny as hell , while pudgy alicia silverstone is hard to accept as an athlete in her debut as batgirl .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: in a movie filled to the brim with major characters , the decision to add the entirely unnecessary batgirl and elle macpherson as bruce wayne's girlfriend is puzzling .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: i suspect the producers inserted the women in an attempt to convince audiences that two guys who run around in rubber suits with built-in nipples , shapely buttocks and huge codpieces are actually straight .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: of course , the real stars of a batman film are the villains and that's where " batman and robin " really suffers .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: as mr . freeze , arnold schwarzenegger gives his worst performance in years , spitting out a stream of lame catch phrases in wooden fashion .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: laboring under a ton of appliances , schwarzenegger looks as if he's having trouble even moving in his suit , let alone trying to act .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: uma thurman fares somewhat better as poison ivy .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: she overacts terribly in the early establishing scenes of her character ( it's apparently a rule in the batman series that before a person becomes a villain , s/he must be a cartoonish , bumbling nerd ) .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: once thurman transforms into the eco-psychotic poison ivy , she does a nice mae west impersonation as a classic vamp who can seduce men with her breath and kill them with a kiss .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: thurman fails to maintain the character's maniacal sense of style though , and ends up merely sputtering her way through the latter scenes of the film .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the biggest lesson to be learned from " batman and robin " is that more is not better .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: joel schumacher fills the screen with eye candy ; but the technicolor overkill merely emphasizes what a trifle the film really is .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: some critics suggest that the batman series has run out of steam .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: i don't think so .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: my prescription ?
docs.label: negative

docs.text: fire joel schumacher ( but offer him a ticket to a rubber fetishist's convention so he'll understand that there's no hard feelings ) .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: give alicia silverstone her walking papers , while keeping clooney , o'donnell and michael gough .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: call jack nicholson and michelle pfieffer and beg them to reprise their roles as the joker and catwoman .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: then , ditch the campiness and , for the love of pete , lose the " event " mentality and make a movie instead of a spectacle next time .
docs.label: negative
